title: Create a Property Marketing Flyer
description: For a new listing, the agent needs to create a marketing flyer to be used at open houses.

tasks.description: Retrieve the property's key details (e.g., price, beds, baths, sqft) and best photos from the MLS listing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all necessary text and images for the flyer.

tasks.description: Use a marketing template to create a new property flyer.
tasks.expected_outcome: A professional, branded flyer is generated using a design template.

tasks.description: Save the flyer as a PDF and order 100 color copies from the print shop.
tasks.expected_outcome: A print-ready PDF is created and an order is placed with the approved printer.
